title: Online Education Quality Management: Collaborative Course Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental online education principles and secondary science teaching experience
context.additional_context: Offline workshop using digital devices (laptops/tablets) to strengthen competencies in designing and quality-managing online science education courses

learning_goals: Learners can develop online science course design documents using a collaborative instructional design model
Learners can submit course improvement proposals incorporating peer and expert feedback aligned with quality control standards
Learners can develop educational effectiveness evaluation tools by leveraging collaboration strategies with fellow instructors and instructional designers
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
